title: Robbery under arms
creator_credit: Joseph Janni, Rank Film Productions and Jack Lee
brief_description: Based on the novel by Rolf Boldrewood, this is the story of the legendary bushranger, Captain Starlight. Set in the bush and goldfields of early Australia, the classic tale comes to life starring Peter Finch as Captain Starlight.
creator_credit_for_label: Joseph Janni, Rank Film Productions and Jack Lee
